name: OhNo.exe
description:
A mostly text-based puzzle game that's only 5-15 minutes long- and also, my first game I've actually finished! I hope you enjoy this, because I'm pretty proud of it.

I wrote this on a plane ride, so I don't exactly remember what this game was supposed to be about, but I think it's still pretty cool, so it's probably fine.

Features:

  • Text & Words. What a shocker.
  • A wonderful beeping sound that you will definitely be sick of by the time you finish.
  • A frog, somewhere. He doesn't do anything, but I love him anyway.
  • Sentences.
  • Puzzles that I barely remember writing.
